sentences.sContent: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.sCn: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.sContent: I would like to say how much we appreciate your hard work.
sentences.sCn: 我想说我们对你的辛勤劳动非常感谢。

sentences.sContent: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.sCn: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.sContent: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.sCn: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.sContent: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.sCn: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

synos.tran: 讲；说明；例如；声称；假设；指明

phrases.pCn: 为自己找借口，为自己辩护
vt. 同意（允诺，承认）；说对

words.tran: 说（say的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to express an idea, feeling, thought etc using words
